The mercenary camp is somehow receiving regular reinforcements, but we don't know how or where they're coming from. No matter how many we kill, their numbers aren't shrinking.

No matter how many mercenaries there are, though, they're useless without their commanders.

We just have to find out where the commanders are camped. Here's a list of sectors to scout, but you'll need Uzair's approval first.

I'd love to go ahead with Nashwa's plan—it's a great idea—but the scouts we sent out in that area haven't come back.

You'll do, though. Go find their commander, {@LinkCreature:32#20#Baalark}, and take him out before these mercenaries get any more ideas.

Bastard finally got what he deserved—I swear on the blood of the soldiers he slaughtered, his head will hang for a week for the crows to feast on and his mercenaries to consider.

Everyone will be thrilled to hear the news. I can't wait to tell Nashwa her plan paid off.
You'll find the mercenary camp north of here. There's no time to waste.
